docs.title: Welcome Aboard!
docs.text: Welcome to ScholarPilot, your premier destination for navigating the complex and fascinating world of knowledge. Here, we believe that every reading journey is an adventure worth sharing.

docs.title: Explore. Learn. Share.
docs.text: At ScholarPilot, we specialize in curating and sharing insightful content focused on computer science, the intriguing frontiers of AI-generated content (AIGC), and diverse reading notes. Whether you're a seasoned tech enthusiast or a newcomer intrigued by the intricacies of programming and AI, there's always something new and fascinating to discover with us. Join our community to explore the cutting-edge developments and practical insights that shape our digital world.

docs.title: Featured Sections
docs.text:
• Blog: Carefully curated insights and annotations from my personal reading journey.
  • AIGC Weekly: Delve into the latest advancements and curious cases in AI-generated content.
  • Algorithm Notes: Detailed explorations and insights into computer science algorithms.

docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I’m a current master’s student at Fudan University with a passion for computer science and programming. I have a keen interest in AIGC and love exploring how technology can transform our understanding of complex topics.

docs.title: 人生​适意​最​难得
docs.text:
​我​不愿​送​人​，​亦​不愿​人​送​我​，​对于​自己​真正​舍不得​离开​的​人​，​离别​的​那​一刹那​像是​开刀​，​凡是​开刀​的​场合​照例​是​应该​先​用​麻醉剂​，​使​病人​在​迷蒙​中​度过​那场​痛苦​，​所以​离别​的​苦痛​最好​避免​。​一个​朋友​说​，“​你​走​，​我​不​送​你​，​你​来​，​无论​多​大风​多​大雨​，​我要​去​接​你​。” ​我​最​赏识​那种​心情​。

​穷人​的​心​是​赤裸​的​，​和​别的​穷人​之间​没有​隔阂​，​所以​穷人​才​最​慷慨​。... ​所以​人穷​往往​自然​的​有​一种​抵抗力​出现​，​是​名曰​：​酸​。​穷​已经​酸化​，​便​不复​是​怕​见​人​的​东西​。​别看​我​衣履​不整​，​我本​不以​衣履​见长​！​别看​我​囊中羞涩​，​我​有所​不取​；​别看​我​落魄​无聊​，​我​有所不为​。... ​穷若​没有​酸​支持​着​，​它​不能​持久​。

docs.title: 行者​无疆
docs.text: ​地球​都​在​流浪​，​你​有​什么​理由​不去​流浪​。 @​麻​女士​ ~​网易​蜗牛​读书​馆​
